    public class StickyGridHeadersGridView
extends android.widget.GridView
implements android.widget.AbsListView.OnScrollListener, android.widget.AdapterView.OnItemClickListener, android.widget.AdapterView.OnItemSelectedListener, android.widget.AdapterView.OnItemLongClickListener
    GridView that displays items in sections with headers that stick to the top of the view.

    • 方法详细资料

      • areHeadersSticky

        public boolean areHeadersSticky()

      • getHeaderAt

        public android.view.View getHeaderAt(int position)
        Gets the header at an item position. However, the position must be that of a HeaderFiller.
        参数:
        position - Position of HeaderFiller.
        返回:
        Header View wrapped in HeaderFiller or null if no header was found.

      • getStickiedHeader

        public android.view.View getStickiedHeader()
        Get the currently stickied header.
        返回:
        Current stickied header.
